message: Let's be fair, Bob.  A slightly better deal for me to start, but we can both be rich.
Your turn to be generous, Alice.  Let's end this quickly and enjoy our gains.
I'm being reasonable, Bob.  This offer still lets us both walk away winners.
Okay Alice, this is getting silly.  Match my previous offer and we'll split the (shrinking) pot.
Bob, we're running out of time.  Meet me in the middle - this is practically even!
